anya-e0105n24:1_0: Kiṁ nissāya katoti etassapi pañhassa attho ācariyeneva pakāsito. Vuttañhi ettha ganthārambhe –
anya-e0105n24:7_0: Sabbasaṅkaradosehi, mutto yasmā pakāsito’’ti dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.ganthārambhakathā.
anya-e0105n24:8_0: Iminā pana vacanena ayamattho pākaṭo hoti –
anya-e0105n24:8_1: ‘‘visuddhimaggaṁ kurumāno ācariyo mahāvihāravāsīnaṁ desanānayasaṅkhātā pañcannampi nikāyānaṁ porāṇaṭṭhakathāyo
anya-e0105n24:8_2: nissāya tāsu vuttaṁ gahetabbaṁ sabbaṁ vinicchayaṁ samāharitvā akāsī’’ti.
anya-e0105n24:8_3: Tasmā yā yā ettha padavaṇṇanā vā vinicchayo vā sādhakavatthu vā dassīyati,
anya-e0105n24:8_4: taṁ sabbaṁ tassa tassa niddhāritapāḷipadassanikāyasaṁvaṇṇanābhūtāya porāṇasīhaḷaṭṭhakathāto ānetvā bhāsāparivattanavaseneva dassitanti veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0105n24:8_5: Ayampi hi visuddhimaggo na kevalaṁ attano ñāṇappabhāvena kato,
anya-e0105n24:8_7: atha kho catunnampi āgamaṭṭhakathānaṁ avayavabhāveneva kato.
anya-e0105n24:12_0: Suparimitaparicchinnaṁ, cattālīsasataṁ hotī’’tiādi dī. ni. aṭṭha. 3.nigamanakathā.
anya-e0105n24:13_0: Yā pana visuddhimagge maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhiniddese ‘‘ayaṁ tāva visuddhikathāyaṁ nayo.
anya-e0105n24:13_3: tāpi mahāvihāravāsīnaṁ desanānaye antogadhā imassa visuddhimaggassa nissayāyevāti veditabbāti.
